pkgmetadata.longdescription: Case-Control Analysis of Multi-Allelic Loci // Data sets and functions for chi-squared Hardy-Weinberg and case- control association tests of highly polymorphic genetic data [e.g., human leukocyte antigen (HLA) data]. Performs association tests at multiple levels of polymorphism (haplotype, locus and HLA amino-acids). Combines rare variants to a common class to account for sparse cells in tables as described by Hollenbach JA, Mack SJ, Thomson G, Gourraud PA. 'Analytical methods for disease association studies with immunogenetic data.' Methods Mol Biol. 2012;882:245-66.
